Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1993...
Injured on 5/6/1994 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Injured on 8/16/1994 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 5 days...
Traded from Los Angeles to Detroit on 5/19/1995 (Going to LA: 2B T. Walker. Going to DET: P S. Garrelts, P E. Hanson, C J. Kendall)...
